Rulings.Edison: No rulings found for this card. Request new rulings at https://discord.gg/shVJnYJNpg
Rulings.Tengu:
●This mandatory effect activates when "XX-Saber Darksoul" is sent to the graveyard.
If it leaves the GY and is then sent there again in the same turn, you can search up to once for each time it was sent there.

● Even if this card leaves the graveyard after resolving, it will resolve normally during the end phase.

● The effect during the end phase does not start a chain.

● If "Thunder King Rai-Oh" is face-up on the field when "XX-Saber Darksoul" is sent to the graveyard but leaves the field before the turn ends, you can still search.

Rulings.Base: 1. [FORUM] You cannot search multiple times for a single "XX-Saber Darksoul" during the same turn. The effect is not limited to once per card per game.

PSCT.Base: During the End Phase, if this card was sent from your side of the field to your Graveyard this turn: You can add 1 "X-Saber" monster from your Deck to your hand.
